name: Gold Defender
description:
You play as a mining turret, your goal is to defend your gold deposits as you collect gold- you defend them from falling rocks due to the collapsing of the mine, and a 'Gold Stealer', a drone controlled by a rival mining company!

Collect as much gold as you can, and reach the top of the leaderboards!

unlock achievements along the way!

FEATURES:

  • An arcade-like gameplay loop
  • Powerups
  • Basic tutorial
  • Achievements
  • Semi-Multiplayer (leaderboards)

CREDITS:

  • Music by SketchyLogic on OpenGameArt.org
  • Code and art by me

(I suck at writing descriptions and stuff)
